page.title: 08LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: ONE OF THE MAJOR PASTIMES IN CROWLE IS FISHING. OTHER{HOBBIES}INCLUDE BMX RIDING, COLLECTING THINGS, OBSERVING WILDLIFE, READING, DRAWING AND WOODWORK. SEVERAL SPORTS ARE POPULAR SUCH AS FOOTBALL, NETBALL, CRICKET AND ROUNDERS. MANY{YOUNG PEOPLE}BELONG TO THE CUBS, BEAVERS, BROWNIES, SCOUTS, GUIDES AND BOYS BRIGADE. THERE IS A YOUTH CLUB WHICH HAS TWO POOL TABLES, DARTS, TABLE TENNIS, TABLE FOOTBALL, FOOTBALL AND BADMINTON. IN THE SUMMER{ {HOLIDAYS}THERE IS A CLUB AT NORTH AXHOLME COMPREHENSIVE. AT THIS YOU CAN SWIM, PLAY TENNIS, BADMINTON, ROUNDERS AND TRY ARCHERY.{ADULTS}BELONG TO A DRAMA CLUB, CONCERT PARTY AND OVER SIXTIES CLUB. THERE IS A WOMEN'S INSTITUTE AND MOTHER'S CLUB WHICH HAVE TALKS AND OUTINGS.THE MOTHER'S CLUB PUTS ON A{SHOW}EACH YEAR.
